Title: A Sedimental Moment
Description:
Some have started to evacuate, but there's a stubborn few that just won't let go. 

Could you say something? 

Maybe an outsider's perspective will get them moving.
ObjectivesText: Help Cenderrag inspire the earthen workers in the Opalcreg.
RewardText:
It worked! Thank you. 

Any earthen saved is a great moment for us all. No matter how long we have left.
